2446.message: I really liked the music. It was so much fun to listen to the music
The live music made for a great night.
The best part is the band playing music on the stage at the front
The food tasted so good. Such unique recipes
I love the food! Couldn't stop eating
We ate some of the best food we've ever eaten
Such disgusting food. Had a bad taste
The service left us disappointed. We didn't like how long it took to get our orders
Such bad service. The waiter took forever
I didn't like the service. Very rude staff
